name: prepvora-ai
description: Full-stack application with Express backend and Vite React frontend.

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend/prepvora-ai
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.render-build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend/prepvora-ai && npm run build --prefix frontend/prepvora-ai

author: Shiwangi
